name: Rabbit - Material Dark Theme
description:
A Material Design based Dark Theme for Rabb.it. Strictly Color Styles, no Animations or Shadows.

Follow me on Twitter: @Mxtive

user.name: Ethan Chrisp
user.about:
Full-Stack Web Developer, Software & Reverse Engineer.

Twitter: @Mxtive
